title: The Celts
creator_credit: Caryl Ebenezer, J Williams, Opus Television and SBS-TV
brief_description: Six part series that discusses the history and legends of the Celtic people of Early Europe. Using paintings, historical locations, buildings and re-enactments, this very detailed and informative documentary provides a historical insight into the Celts and their culture and is complimented by some stunning landscape cinematography. Narrated by John Morgan.
